page.shortlink: api objects system filefind object last access time function
page.description: The .LAST_ACCESS_TIME() method returns the time the file was last accessed.
page.example: dim ptr as P ptr = filefind.first("c:\*.txt", FILE_FIND_NORMAL) ? ptr.last_access_time() = 02/27/2003 04:51:35 12 pm ? ptr.last_write_time() = 02/27/2003 04:51:35 12 pm ? ptr.name() = "c:\Button.Txt"
